headline: Is General Mills (GIS) Pricing Reflect A Disconnect After Prolonged Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether General Mills is fairly priced or offering value right now, this article will walk through what the current share price might be implying. The stock recently closed at US$44.51, with a 2.4% return over the last 7 days, a 7.0% decline over 30 days, and longer term returns of 2.6% decline year to date and 21.6% decline over 1 year. Recent attention around General Mills has focused on how the share price compares with estimates of fair value and how income focused...
